original_text: A ruin, ruin, ruin I will make it. This also shall not be, until he comes, the one to whom judgment belongs, and I will give it to him.
korean_text: 내가 엎드러뜨리고 엎드러뜨리고 엎드러뜨리려니와 이것도 다시 있지 못하리라 마땅히 얻을 자가 이르면 그에게 주리라

sentences.original_text: A ruin, ruin, ruin I will make it.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그것을 폐허, 폐허, 폐허로 만들리라.

sentences.original_text: the one to whom judgment belongs,
and I will give it to him.
